- Up (1, 18): death (`$`)
- Down (3, 18): death (`$`)
- Left (2, 17): empty space (smoke `%`)

I can see that moving left to (2, 17) where there is smoke, which will provide a shield against the death sprite. This is my best move.

Thus, I will proceed with my next action.

``` Action:2 ```
Moving left into the smoke should protect me from death and give me time to plan further actions.
